overview: Steamy sex, Attempted Murder, Lying, Cheating, Revenge…Just a typical day in Hollywood. After a hit and run, actor Peter Williams (Marcus London) comes to in the middle of the street with a concussion.Confused about who he is, Peter can’t distinguish between his “reel” life and real” life! Who’s cheating on who?Who’s trying to kill who? What’s reality and what’s a figment of Peter’s imagination?
title: Camera Angle
